original: Yo adoso adussanā adussitattaṁ …pe… abyāpādo abyāpajjo adoso kusalamūlaṁ—

corrected: yaḥ adosaḥ a dussanā a dussita ttam pe a byāpādaḥ a byāpajjaḥ a dosaḥ kusala mūlam

original: kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavo.

corrected: kāma āsavo bhava āsavo diṭṭha āsavo avijja āsavo

original: Yo bhavesu bhavachando bhavarāgo bhavanandī bhavataṇhā bhavasineho bhavapariḷāho bhavamucchā bhavajjhosānaṁ—

original: vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti vā;

original: Seyyohamasmīti māno, sadisohamasmīti māno, hīnohamasmīti māno.
